member.name: P:Olive.LocalTime.Now
member.summary:
Gets the local current date/time of the application.
By default it equals to System.DateTime.Now.
To override its value, you should wrap the calling code inside "using (LocalTime.SetNow(some date)) { ... }"
Examples:
—————————————————————————————————
var now = LocalTime.Now // which is identical to DateTime.Now
—————————————————————————————————
using (LocalTime.Set(DateTime.Parse("15/01/2000 06:13")))
{
var date = LocalTime.Now; // that sets date to 15th Jan 200 at 6:13.
}

member.name: P:Olive.LocalTime.UtcNow
member.summary: Gets the current Universal Time.

member.name: P:Olive.LocalTime.Today
member.summary:
Gets the local current date of the application (no time).
By default it equals to System.DateTime.Today.
To override its value, you should wrap the calling code inside "using (LocalTime.SetNow(some date)) { ... }"
Examples:
—————————————————————————————————
var now = LocalTime.Today // which is identical to DateTime.Today
—————————————————————————————————
using (LocalTime.Set(DateTime.Parse("15/01/2000 06:13")))
{
var date = LocalTime.Today; // that sets date to 15th Jan 200.
}

member.name: T:Olive.TemporaryFile
member.summary:
This class provides a unique file path in a temporary folder (i.e. in the application temp folder in the system by default and can be provided in Config of the application through a setting with key "Application.TemporaryFilesPath") After this instance is disposed any possibly created file in the path will be deleted physically.
If this class fails to dispose an application event will be added to the projects database.

member.name: M:Olive.TemporaryFile.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of temporary file. The file will have "dat" extension by default.

member.name: P:Olive.TemporaryFile.FilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the FilePath of this TemporaryFile.

member.name: M:Olive.TemporaryFile.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of temporary file. with the given extension. Extension can either have "." or not

member.name: M:Olive.TemporaryFile.GetTemporaryFileFolder
member.summary: Finds a proper folder path for temporary files

member.name: M:Olive.TemporaryFile.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes this instance of temporary file and deletes the file if provided
